text: Tin(II) bromide, also known as stannous bromide, is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is SnBr2. It contains tin and bromide ions. The tin is in its +2 oxidation state. ==Properties== Tin(II) bromide is a yellowish solid. Its color is between the bright orange tin(II) iodide and the colorless tin(II) chloride. It is a reducing agent. ==Preparation== It is made by reacting tin or its oxide with hydrobromic acid. ==Uses== Tin(II) bromide is used to make organic compounds with tin atoms attached. ==Related pages== *Tin(II) iodide *Tin(IV) bromide Category:Tin compounds Category:Bromine compounds
title: Tin(II) bromide
